caption.title: Sub-strains generated from CBD monomer isolated by SEC or cutoff filter.
caption.p: Ms from CBD brain was purified by immunoprecipitation followed by SEC or passage through a 100kD cutoff filter, prior to inoculation into DS1 cells. CBD sub-strains, CBD1-3(m), were quantified. Isolation of Ms from CBD brain by SEC or cutoff filter enabled a similar proportion of sub-strains to form. Columns indicate the number of clones identified (n) and the percentage this represents of the total (%). Ms created similar strain patterns regardless of filtration method. Classification of cell morphology was performed using blinded analysis.
